Posts.Content: Hi loolyboo I stopped after 6 herceptin and now taking cbd oil instead. Every single joint in my body was agony I was on permanent painkillers some nights I cldnt sleep for the nagging pains. My onc suggested the cbd oil instead it's meant to help stop recurrence so I'm  giving it a go quality of life is as important to me  Lots of love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Herceptin Injection

Posts.Content: Hi lavendergirl  I know exactly what yr saying I had to pass the chemo unit to get to radiotherapy and it gave me the heeby jeebies! Still does even to step foot in the hospital for anything !   ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Annual mammogram - how long for result

Posts.Content: Hi lavendergirl  I got my 1st one on 1st sept got results 29th sept exactly 4wks  Be fine my lovely ❤️  Lynn xx
Posts.Title: Annual mammogram - how long for result

Posts.Content: Here here as I said I had to wait from 1st sept to 29th sept !  We have gone through so much having to wait that length of time is awful.  Lynn xxx

Posts.Content: How perfectly said so true ❤️

Posts.Title: Annual mammogram - how long for result

Posts.Content: Hi lavendergirl  I called at 3 weeks and she told me over the phone it was ok but it needed verified then wld b posted out that took another week so worth calling after 3 wks for sure ! Where do I live ? It’s ninewells in Dundee that u have to wait for a month !   Lynn ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Annual mammogram - how long for result

Posts.Content: Hi Katie  That’s great and the way it shld be !! I had a month to wait !  Good luck ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Annual mammogram - how long for result

Posts.Content: I call mine ‘demon debbie’ Sometimes I cry every day not all day but at some point in the day it’s hard to claw yrself out of it. I too have always been ‘strong and cheerful’ and everyone thinks yr doing great .... things r’nt always what they seem are they. If I try to tell my parents about how I feel they say ‘why r u going there yr better now” !! They either don’t get it or prob don’t want to ! It’s a hard thing all round  Good luck and thank you ❤️  Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Mental Health side effects

Posts.Content: Hi  My nodes were clear albeit I got chemo 1st but they checked nodes during lumpectomy and it had never bn there. See what he says my onc was great. If he says no then say ok after 4 Chemo's I want an ultrasound if it's gone no more or you can reassess. That's what I wld have done and if he'd refused I would have paid for an ultrasound myself much rather that than go thru 2 more Chemo's  for nothing it's brutal esp T!  Let me know how u get on ❤️ Lynn xxxx
Posts.Title: 4 vs 6 TCH

Posts.Content: Hi mossom2 I only had 4 and my tumour had gone. A friend who I met at hospital had 6 her tumour did not change in size after 4 by the 6th it was same size so she wished she'd just had the 4. I think it depends on the type you have it maybe an idea to take all the paperwork and findings you have to yr onc and discuss further. That's what I did and he agreed only 4. Just as well as I would have had the extra 2 for no reason as mine was gone in 4 and it was 33mm  Hope this helps Lynn ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: 4 vs 6 TCH

Posts.Content: Hi foxysash Yes yr fine to drive it only takes mins & no SE that stop u from driving I drive everyday ❤️ Love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy - week 3 of 3

Posts.Content: Hi adassarose  I too finished my last rads on 3rd Nov it's strange not going to hospital everyday I have bn off work throughout and my partner & I are off on holiday next w/e for 5 days for a well earned break then I'm bk to work 23rd Nov after 7 months off .... you do get there  Enjoy yr break love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy - week 3 of 3

Posts.Content: Hi candytop I didn't drive after chemo as I always had someone with me I never felt too well after it but I wld have driven if I had to although it was only a 20 min drive not sure I cld do much longer  Love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy - week 3 of 3

Posts.Content: Hi Michelle  I feel like that too I still can't actually believe it that for the past 7 months my life has bn in a box and I can now go & open said box and take my life back ! Scary but good I just struggle with trying to stop myself worrying about "will it come back" "will I be ok" blah blah some days easier than others but I'm hopeful this will get better with time.  My partner & I r off to Spain on sat for 5  days for a well earned break as we had to cancel our holidays for this year so batteries will hopefully recharged ready to face work colleagues... another hurdle  Lots of love Lynn ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy - week 3 of 3

Posts.Content: Hi wombat23 Well I think exercise is a marvellous thing it releases feel good endorphins, you look better, you feel better and the most important one it's helps reduce recurrence so it's a win win and that's good enough reasons for me to keep going so give it a try even power walking if u have a smart tv there is thousands of workouts etc u can try as some weight training is good to rebuild muscle good luck ❤️ Love Lynn xxxx
Posts.Title: Was this the start?

Posts.Content: Hi wombat23 I think that all the time too when did it start ?? I found out only due to stabbing pain in my breast no lump and they say no pain with breast cancer !!! I went to GP was referred within 3 wks I had mammogram found a 31mm lump behind my nipple hence the reason I cldnt feel it no spread that was 26th April was getting 1st chemo on 16th may lumpectomy 26th Aug rads 3rd nov bk to work 24th Nov and trying to get on with my life and not dwell on the what ifs & why fors not easy but I find being bk to work stops that to a degree as I don't have time to 'dwell'  on it.  I'm eating clean,  managing to workout & run a mile non stop (very proud of myself) 3 x a week. It's all we can do otherwise we'd go mad worrying about it coming back !  Love Lynn ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Was this the start?

Posts.Content: What Lynn no endorphins none ? I don't particularly like the actual exercise part but I do love the view from the moral high ground afterwards Good for you in cycling etc it is meant to benefit us so keep those legs moving ❤️❤️❤️ Love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Was this the start?

Posts.Content: Hi Sally-Lou  I went for my 1st appt 26th April 2016 they told me they were sure it was BC & come bk 3rd may for confirmation & by 16th may I was sitting having my 1st chemo & now after 4 chemos I get my surgery a week on Friday. Saying that I remember those dates like it was yesterday the roller coaster of emotions, uncertainty, fear of the Unknown, telling family & most importantly getting yr own head around the roller coaster you have bn put on. Try & stay positive & don't build & cross those bridges until you know the facts & what yr dealing with. I found the Unknown the worst thing once yr plan is in place u feel a bit more in control. I have found the site invaluable on up days & more importantly on down days & you will have them but hopefully more up than down ❤️ We're all here to offer help & support yr not alone  Love & hugs Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Diagnosed this week - helpless

Posts.Content: Hi Phaedra  I finished my treatment beginning of Nov 16 I went bk to work 23rd Nov and I too haven’t had a day off. I was determined to ‘get back to normal ‘ threw myself back to working out blah blah but chemo can damage soft tissue so u find u get injuries that maybe u wldnt have got b4 it can take upto 3yrs to get bk to what you were if at all. So whilst I wld say yes get on with yd life I wld say just be aware you may not find it that easy as frustrating as that maybe I think we have to try and accept that .... not easy and I still get frustrated, sad and angry at the whole bloody thing but it is what it is.  Good luck lynn ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Finishing treatment..

Posts.Content: Hi loulou99 Sorry I only just saw this I hope it went well and if u did cold cap good luck just make sure it fits all yr head tight it has to touch too small & it misses the crown an u don't want bald patches !! Also invest in a wet brush best thing I bought.  Don't get to worried if u get tingling or an aching feeling on yr scalp it doesn't mean it's going to fall out !! Leaving argon oil on all night is also good massage into scalp and brush thru and shampoo off in morning.  Remember if follicles are not damaged yr hair won't fall out regardless of what you do I used mousse blow dried it etc and it was fine.  It does dry out (hence argon oil) but it's well worth it I lost little or no hair it was just strands I lost if u want more info private message me and I can go into it further I will add u as a friend  Hang in there xxx
Posts.Title: Fidst chemo session tomorrow

Posts.Content: Hi jump123 I start my rads next Thursday & was advised to get R1 & R2 cream/gel from yr gp it's hailed as being excellent for cooling skin, repairing skin & minimising burning etc. I have mine so I wld advise you to call yr gp ASAP & get some. My GP didn't know what it was (neither did radiographer) !! But doc looked it up & got it no problem. If you google R1 & R2 it comes up with more info & reviews  Love Lynn Xxx

Posts.Content: Hi jump123 Here's a link for info www.radiotherapytreatment.com/.../ Xxx Lynn

Posts.Title: Really bloody angry !!!

Posts.Content: Hi Teresa I am same a year since mine I had chemo lumpectomy and rads I had an ache in my back ribs and was worried  I went to see my bcn the rib ache can b from rads,   she did a full examination we chatted I had a cry she gave me a hug we laughed I was in there 40 mins she said she had no worries so it's worth calling and making an appointment.... stops you worrying for at least 48hrs We're all the same I'm sure don't think we'd b normal if we didn't Lots of love Lynn ❤️ Xxx

I have heard juicing is good to put all nutrients back into your system .... Any thoughts ? Thought it maybe a good idea if u didn't fancy food but at least you were getting something. Also any advice on vitamins you can take on FECT-T ? ❤️ X

Worth a try Xxx

Posts.Title: Chemo Starts Tomorrow

Posts.Content: Hi sugar65 I know it's bn a funny day really can't believe I'll be 51 next Monday & 1 chemo down if someone had told me that on my 50th I would next have believed it but what a difference a year makes !! Posts.Title: Eyebrow Tinting!

Posts.Content: God knows lizz I have only ever known it as cold cap. I am in touch with Kathyn Paxman I am their Aug campaigner due to keeping my hair and that's the way it was described to me at hospital & the way I have talked to Paxman about it & never bn corrected so I assumed that's what it's known as Look after Yrself sending lots of love ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Difference between 'cold cap' and 'scalp-cooling'

Posts.Content: Hi  I had knee pain,  heel pain neck pain this has all been eradicated by acupuncture it's worked a treat for me ❤️  Lynn ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Anything is worth a try..... joint pain

Posts.Content: Hi lizz  I only know it as cold cap never been described to me as anything else ! Not sure if this is what yr after or not sorry  If I can be more help just holler ❤️ Xxxx
Posts.Title: Difference between 'cold cap' and 'scalp-cooling'

Posts.Content: Hi  There is penguin cold caps I believe the USA use these more than uk do & ur correct the caps have to be changed every 30 mins as its not connected to a constant cooling machine like the Paxman. I am lead to believe scalp cooling is pos an old regime (that clearly doesn't work) as the whole point of cold cap is it has to be -5 constantly to freeze the hair follicles a bag of ice on yr head just doesn't cut it I hope we are helping lizz !  Lots of love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Difference between 'cold cap' and 'scalp-cooling'

Posts.Content: Hi fatpuffin Well I have done the complete opposite and decided on not taking it at all I was to get letrozole and my onc said it wld cause joint pain so I  have gone down the cbd oil route instead.  From what I have gathered there all pretty much the same really it's forcing yr body into something against its will. You have to look at quality of life too my onc agreed and said we cld be over prescribing you and it won't come back and u didn't actually need it !! Not much help but it was enough for me to decide on an alternative route. They also said 6 Chemo's my tumour disappeared in 4 they stopped at 4 as I was so ill I cld have ended up enduring another 2 Chemo's for no reason so throwing everything at you isn't always the right thing but it's a personal choice x Take care  Lynn x
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen v letrazole

Posts.Content: Hi nik  I know me too and I was the same ! But I think as long as u keep them informed it will be fine ❤️  Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Time off work and do I have to keep my employee updated

Posts.Content: Hi nik Of crse not Hun, I finished rads Nov last year and started bk to work phrased return 23rd Nov for 4 weeks returned Jan full time. It's a personal thing I just wanted to 'get bk to being me' and sitting at home with time to dwell did my head no use at all. Being bk at work helped being busy stopped the dark thoughts creeping in   Love Lynn ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Time off work and do I have to keep my employee updated

Posts.Content: Hi nicky It's a cold cap you wear before during and after chemo it freezes the follicles helping it not to fall out. Have a look at this link it's my story on the cold cap site I was there August pioneer as mine was so successful paxmanscalpcooling.com/.../lynn-wadland Love Lynn ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Time off work and do I have to keep my employee updated

Posts.Content: Hi nicky  Yr welcome And yr right we do especially with this bugger of a thing .... knowledge is power lol  Take care my lovely hope all goes well and get in touch anytime ❤️ Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Time off work and do I have to keep my employee updated

Posts.Content: Hi nik2017 Gay is spot on I was off for 8 months and all my work wanted was the next sick line handed in. I work for the council they were great. Mind you when I went back to work I was put on a sickness monitor for 6 months which is now up. I did find that a tad insulting as that monitor is more for folk who take time off for no reason not someone who's bn off with bloody cancer but hey ho rules are rules So don't worry I think as long as u keep them informed and upto speed y'll be fine. We have enough to worry about without adding that to the mix !!  Take care lynn ❤️ Xxxx
Posts.Title: Time off work and do I have to keep my employee updated

Posts.Content: Hi nik I read yr profile and added u as a friend I had invasive as well stage 3 and no lymph involvement. I had chemo 1st then lumpectomy then rads. I hope u don't have to do the chemo route but if you do and decide on using the cold cap let me know I used it and lost little or no hair Love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Time off work and do I have to keep my employee updated

Posts.Content: Aw yr welcome Nicky  I think being positive is the best thing not always easy as we all have our bad days ❤️ Love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Time off work and do I have to keep my employee updated

Posts.Content: Hi Sara  I did cold cap & lost little hair no more than u normally wld.  If u read my previous posts you will see the main thing is ITS TIGHT TOUCHES THE ENTIRE SCALP. Take a paracetamol an hr b4 of during it you feel u need another ask nurses. The 1st 10 mins is very cold but very bearable & after that it's ok.  As its tight (make sure strap under chin is also tight) the pressure can build & u may get a headache but other than that it's fine. If yr on fec its to stay on 90 mins after chemo ends but I would say it's 100% worth it if u want to private message me for more detailed tips I'll give u my number.  Please don't apologise for jumping in that's what we're here for & I'm more than happy to help ❤️ Lots of love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Hair cuts for cold cap?

Posts.Content: Hi hetty Your very very welcome it just makes me so mad we're going through enough without worrying about that !! Kathryn is lovely & very helpful Let me know how it goes lots of love  Lynn ❤️ Xxxx
Posts.Title: Hair cuts for cold cap?

Posts.Content: Hi hetty50 Omg !! I am shocked of course it makes a difference The reason it's thinning on yr crown is because the cap is not touching it properly it needs to be TIGHT the ties on cap have to be pulled tight and the chin strap also there can't b air on top of cap at the crown.  It makes me so mad that lots of women go through this it's totally &  utterly unnecessary.  What chemo are you away to get fec or T or other ?  On the Paxman machine there shld be a laminated time guide re what chemo = what times it's to be on m.  The reason it's kept on after chemo is to ensure it's kept cold while chemo dissipates away from the scalp message me if you want more info  Lots of love Lynn xxxx
Posts.Title: Hair cuts for cold cap?

Posts.Content: Susien Also it's 30 mins b4 chemo & 90 mins after for fec & 30 mins after for T YOU MUST KERP IT ON FOR THS ALLOTED TIME OR IT WILL NOT WORK. I blow dried my hair I put mousse on it the only thing I did different was cut down on washing it to twice a week. I found a wet brush (amazon £5) was best purchase it doesn't pull yr hair wet or dry.  The best bit of advice I was given was from a top Scottish hairdresser who has dealt with wigs & chemo patients for over 40 yrs if the hair follicles are not damaged it won't fall out so you can treat it like yr hair.  If they are damaged it will fall out.  As I said I lost little or no more hair than you would in normal shedding &  mine is long. So before you go rash think about it because if it does thin you have the length to tie it up & it will still look tidy you get it cut short that's it if it's a mess yr snookered ❤️ Private message me if you want a proper chat  Love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Hair cuts for cold cap?

Posts.Content: Hi hetty50 The fec timings are 30 mins b4 chemo during chemo & 90 mins after chemo.  I am small built & 5ft 2" & I had a med cap I'm thinking the reason it's falling out on crown is cos it's too small you have to have it tight yes but if it's too small it will not touch yr crown !  I had a medium cap & that can be tightened by the straps on sides of cap.  Ask to try on the medium & get her to fit it & pull straps & see if u feel it's a better fit it has to touch every part.  I am mad for you it's not for the faint hearted & takes patience & determination to do it so if staff are not trained correctly in how to put it on ur fighting a losing battle !! It's all very well them saying it's not a guarantee.... no their right if it's not fitted properly   Lots of love Lynn xxxx
Posts.Title: Hair cuts for cold cap?

Posts.Content: Hetty50 paxmanscalpcooling.com This is Paxman Kathryn is lovely if u contact her & ask her advice & get her to email you correct fitting instructions.  She's really helpful Let me know how u get on Love Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Hair cuts for cold cap?

Posts.Content: Hi susien I did cold cap & lost little or no hair I didn't get mine cut & mine is past my shoulders so don't feel you have to.  All ur hair that is past yr neck isn't in the cap anyway so it's only the hair touching the scalp that's important just make sure it's tight & touching every part of yr scalp that's the most crucial thing Lots of love Lynn ❤️ Xxx
Posts.Title: Hair cuts for cold cap?

Posts.Content: Yay mike good positive news for a change well done you Xx
Posts.Title: From cancer to cross-country. A positive post.

Posts.Content: Hi mark  I have had 5 Herceptin (4 with no chemo) &  I also confirm the runny nose.  I do get aches & pains but I find this 1st thing & when I sit down for too long if I keep moving it's fine I am back to working out & walking.  I'm 14 rads down& 6 to go & am feeling tired from that but still managing the workouts so all in all more than manageable with a little help from a brufen now & again Lots of luck  Lynn x
Posts.Title: Herceptin effects

Posts.Content: Hi Sacha  I used cold cap and mine was fine the only thing I can think of is it was fitted so well on yr last session ? It has to be spot on every time was it the same nurse fitting it every time ? Xxx Lynn xxx
Posts.Title: Hair or no hair ,

Posts.Content: Hi dee Yes use it everyday gel and moisturiser as it goes on the effects build up and u continue 'cooking' over the days you don't have it. By the time I got near the end I got an itchy rash I took antihistamine and within 20 mins itch gone so if u experience that take one a day works a treat. The R1 R2 are great and worked well for me (apart from my purse) I used to lie on the bed with my gel on for 20 mins and get the iPad out and shop lol  Good luck with it it is tiring going up every day but funnily enough it does pass relatively quickly Lynn ❤ xxx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy questions

Posts.Content: Hi eksheperd I call mine 'debbie demon' oh how she plays with my head every ache every pain anything at all and she's there nipping away at me, she's not happy until I am beside myself !!! Tell her to f..k off and enjoy yr kids, yr life and 'try' and keep busy go for walks with the pram exercise releases feel good endorphins and deal with things as they happen and not before.  Stay strong my lovely you can do this ❤️ Xxxxx
Posts.Title: Lost!!!!!

Posts.Content: Hi Julia  Just being nosey and incase mine comes bk in my breast where how do I apply the tape to the breast ? Xx Love Lynn x
Posts.Title: Possible to reduce lymphodema in arm?

Posts.Content: Hi dee I had it slightly in my actual breast and had acupuncture it can help so maybe worth speaking to an acupuncture clinic it helped me  Good luck xxx Lynn ❤️
Posts.Title: Possible to reduce lymphodema in arm?

Posts.Content: Hi lilleybumble  I too am the same I didn't take letrozole either I workout 5 days a week I juice celery and drink it every day I take vits and cbd oil every day and yr right it never leaves you e dry twinge a headache anything. I too have a busy job so that keeps me 'sane' but I feel it's like a life sentence wehabe bn given just gotta keep hoping keep trying and god willing we'll be ok  My bc breast is bigger than the other amd tender too it's a pain in the arse ❤ Lots of love Lynn xxxx
